question: Recently, Scientists from India have discovered seven new frog species belonging to the genus Nyctibatrachus, commonly known as Night Frogs. These new species have been discovered in which of the following parts of India?
explanation: Recently, Scientists from India have discovered seven new frog species belonging to the genus Nyctibatrachus, in the Western Ghats. These adorable creatures are among the smallest in the world, and four of the new species are tiny enough to fit on a fingernail.
